title: Extra-heavy face with angled ends on the uppercase X
content:
I'm looking for an extra-bold typeface that has angled ends on both strokes of the X, kind of like the letters in [this photo](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022113222/http:/upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/6/63/AmsterdamCOA.jpg).

Any thoughts?
author: ashuttl

comments.content: Maybe you could use the multiplication sign **×** instead?

These St.Andrew's Crosses in the Coat of Arms are probably not meant to be letters. If you want to re-create the arms, try a plus symbol rotated 45 degrees.

Andreas
